alert.note: Alert for Laclede; Webster; Wright (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 2:29PM CDT until April 20 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CDT FOR EASTERN WEBSTER...WRIGHT AND EASTERN LACLEDE COUNTIES... At 229 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles east of Lebanon to 9 miles northwest of Hartville to Diggins, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Mansfield around 255 PM CDT. Hartville around 300 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Morgan, Duncan, Twin Bridges, Competition, Manes, Rader, Lynchburg, Grovespring, Dry Knob and Falcon. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 124 and 132, and between mile markers 138 and 144. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
